forum.name: guided tours
forum.latestCommentText: it looks like youre being held hostage. do you need help?

thread.title: tour 2 - labour of love

comments.text: in this tour we look at highly details areas that sometimes take months to complete.
[the shelter -surface-] is worth the loading wait. in a myst style world you are transported to a floating ark. this world uses anyland space to its' maximum.
[the underground] is a colaboration effort and really shows the best of the creators. full of interactions and animations, this amospheric dungeon styled world leaves you in awe.
[the tavern] takes you back to 1717 england. still a work in progress can you spot the false perspective, animated cat and over 500 hand placed bricks and stones.
[isle of styx] is a head for heights location with great use of what you can do with a little bit of copy and paste and an ample amount of determination.
[the varga] dropship transports you to deep space, expore its vast coridors and expimental biodomes , warp to the next level.
[fazzis home] growing day by day this metropolis of anyland creates portals to other worlds. just remember to check the blimp and use the flare gun to highlight your location.
